title: Blademaster & Assassin
body: I've been wondering for a while now on why BF Sword + Spatula turn you into an assassin while Recurve Bow + Spatula turns you into a blademaster, shouldn't it be the other way around?

replies.body:
attack damage = burst damage and  attack speed = sustained damage.

assassins are known to burst their targets so AD/AP is their core stat

while blade masters are those swift attackers who deal sustained damage through attack speed [{{champion:119}} deals sustained burst damage:P]

I'm ok with the assassin item,

But bow + Spatula making you into a blademaster is dumb, it should turn you into a ranger.

> [{quoted}](name=Urgash,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=ViAmOGih,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-08-28T11:58:21.944+0000)
>
> I'm ok with the assassin item,
> 
> But bow + Spatula making you into a blademaster is dumb, it should turn you into a ranger.

They wanted to make an item turning someone into a blademaster for synergy sake.  Given that, what item combined with spatula should they give?  Considering blademasters' central bonus is increased attack speed, the bow fits.

Thematically, it would make more sense to turn into a ranger, but the ranger buff isn't built to be able to easily add other champs into it.  For one, the increase happens every 2 champs (instead of blademaster's 3), so it would be OP if you could easily get 4+ Rangers.
It should, have been wondering the same
